subject: Baseball
Cyberattacks and Hackers
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. and the Justice Department are investigating whether officials for the St. Louis Cardinals hacked into the networks of the Houston Astros to steal information about player personnel.
snippet: The F.B.I. and the Justice Department are investigating whether officials for the St. Louis Cardinals hacked into the networks of the Houston Astros to steal information about player personnel.
